Logging Util¶

class util.logging_util.LoggingUtil[source]¶

This class provides logging utilities

calculate_execution_time(end_time, start_time)[source]¶

calculates the execution time

Parameters:
  • end_time (datetime) – end execution time
  • start_time (datetime) – start execution time
get_file_handler(logger, log_filename, level)[source]¶

gets the file handler associated to a logger

Parameters:
  • logger (Object) – logger
  • log_filename (str) – logger file name
  • level (str) – level of the logger (error, warning, info)
get_logger(log_filename)[source]¶

gets the logger

Parameters:log_filename (str) – logger file name
get_logger_level(level)[source]¶

gets the logger level

Parameters:level (str) – name of the level
remove_file_handler_logger(logger, fileHandler)[source]¶

removes file handler from logger

Parameters:
  • logger (Object) – logger
  • fileHandler (Object) – file handler
